issue.title: [CI] Update homebrew before calling brew bundle
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-9592](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-9592). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

The macOS GHA builds have started to fail recently. We need to update brew itself before installing the dependencies.
